endpoints.name: Get Restaurants (cached, expanded)
endpoints.description: Fetch African restaurants across the US. Uses cache when available, otherwise fetches from Google and caches results.

endpoints.name: Search Restaurants
endpoints.description: Search restaurants by keyword and city using Google Places, with reviews included for top results.

endpoints.name: Nearby Restaurants (cache-first)
endpoints.description: Find nearby African restaurants using cache-first distance matching (5/30/60 min tiers). If none in cache, fetches from Google and caches.
notes: Either lat+lng or city is required.

endpoints.name: Get Events (live)
endpoints.description: Fetch African events from Ticketmaster live (no cache).

endpoints.name: Search Events
endpoints.description: Search events via Ticketmaster with flexible filters.
